author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r22762, squashing two error leaks.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(svn_client_copy4, svn_client_move5): If we are retrying the copy or
move because the target already exists, clear the original error
first.  Also correct a comment typo.

author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r22845.  Ensure that a pool cleanup function always returns
a defined value.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/util.c
(dav_request_cleanup): Always return APR_SUCCESS.

author: pburba
msg: Merged revisions 22598-22908 via svnmerge from svn/trunk.

author: vgeorgescu
msg: Enable ra_dav tests to work in conjunction with DLL builds on Windows.
* win-tests.py
Construct a list of DLL files instead of just paths to those DLLs.
(locate_libs): Copy the library DLLs and the Apache modules to the
root of the build tree, and stop adding the DLL paths to the PATH
environment variable.
(Httpd.__init__): Call _svn_module with just the name of the module.
(Httpd._svn_module): Tell Apache to look for the module at the top of
the build tree.
Suggested by: brane
djh

author: dlr
msg: Merge r22729 from trunk into the 1.4.x branch, fixing a potential
filesystem memory leak in commit-finalization loop.
Votes: +1: dlr, jerenkrantz, malcolm
